016package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service;
017
018import android.app.Activity;
019import android.content.Context;
020import android.content.pm.PackageInfo;
021import android.content.pm.PackageManager;
022import android.content.pm.PackageManager.NameNotFoundException;
023import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
024import androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat;
025import androidx.core.content.ContextCompat;
026import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
027import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
028import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
029import java.util.HashSet;
030import java.util.Set;
031import java.util.stream.Collectors;
032import java.util.stream.Stream;
033import javax.inject.Inject;
034import javax.inject.Singleton;
035
036/**
037 * Implements a {@link LiveData}-based repository of permissions granted by the user, and handles
038 * the low-level details of the permissions flow. Note that while this class is declared (using
039 * {@link Singleton}) as a singleton, the {@link #checkPermissions(Activity, Set, Set)
040 * checkPermissions(Activity, Set&lt;String&gt;, Set&lt;String&gt;)} and
041 * {@link #handlePermissionsRequestResult(String[], int[])} methods are <em>not</em> thread-safe;
042 * as a rule, those should be invoked only by an instance of
043 * {@link edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel.PermissionsViewModel}, which should in turn be
044 * scoped to the main activity of the app.
045 */
046@Singleton
047public class PermissionsRepository {
048
049  private final Context context;
050  private final MutableLiveData<Set<String>> permissions;
051
052  @Inject
053  PermissionsRepository(@SuppressWarnings("unused") @ApplicationContext Context context) {
054    this.context = context;
055    permissions = new MutableLiveData<>(new HashSet<>());
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Returns {@link LiveData} of all permissions declared in {@code AndroidManifest.xml} that have
060   * been granted (implicitly or explicitly) to the app.
061   */
062  public LiveData<Set<String>> getPermissions() {
063    return permissions;
064  }
065
066  public void checkPermissions(
067      Activity activity, Set<String> permissionsToRequest, Set<String> permissionsToExplain) {
068    try {
069      Set<String> permissionsNeeded = getManifestPermissions();
070      Set<String> permissionsGranted = permissions.getValue();
071      queryPermissionGrants(activity,
072          permissionsNeeded, permissionsGranted, permissionsToRequest, permissionsToExplain);
073      permissions.postValue(permissionsGranted);
074    } catch (NameNotFoundException e) {
075      throw new RuntimeException(e);
076    }
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Handles response passed (indirectly) from
081   * {@link Activity#onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[])}, adding all granted
082   * permissions to a {@link LiveData LiveData&lt;Set&lt;String&gt;&gt;}.
083   *
084   * @param permissionsRequested {@link String String[]} containing all permissions requested of the
085   *                             user by last invocation of
086   *                             {@link Activity#requestPermissions(String[], int)}.
087   * @param grantResults         {@code int[]} of grant/deny results.
088   * @noinspection DataFlowIssue
089   */
090  public void handlePermissionsRequestResult(
091      @NonNull String[] permissionsRequested, @NonNull int[] grantResults) {
092    Set<String> permissions = this.permissions.getValue();
093    for (int i = 0; i < permissionsRequested.length; i++) {
094      String permission = permissionsRequested[i];
095      int result = grantResults[i];
096      if (result == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED) {
097        permissions.add(permission);
098      } else {
099        permissions.remove(permission);
100      }
101    }
102    this.permissions.postValue(permissions);
103  }
104
105  private Set<String> getManifestPermissions() throws NameNotFoundException {
106    PackageInfo info = context
107        .getPackageManager()
108        .getPackageInfo(context.getPackageName(),
109            PackageManager.GET_META_DATA | PackageManager.GET_PERMISSIONS);
110    return Stream.of(info.requestedPermissions)
111        .collect(Collectors.toSet());
112  }
113
114  private void queryPermissionGrants(Activity activity,
115      Set<String> permissionsNeeded, Set<String> permissionsGranted,
116      Set<String> permissionsToRequest, Set<String> permissionsToExplain) {
117    for (String permission : permissionsNeeded) {
118      if (ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(activity, permission)
119          != PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED) {
120        permissionsToRequest.add(permission);
121        if (ActivityCompat.shouldShowRequestPermissionRationale(activity, permission)) {
122          permissionsToExplain.add(permission);
123        }
124      } else {
125        permissionsGranted.add(permission);
126      }
127    }
128  }
129
130}
